verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <WH7892> A Song הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <WH4609> of degrees רַ֭בַּת <WH7227> Many a time צְרָר֣וּנִי <WH6887> have they afflicted מִנְּעוּרַ֑י <WH5271> me from my youth יֹֽאמַר־ <WH559> now say נָ֝א <WH4994> now יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> may Israel

רַ֭בַּת <WH7227> Many a time צְרָר֣וּנִי <WH6887> have they afflicted מִנְּעוּרָ֑י <WH5271> me from my youth גַּ֝ם <WH1571> Yet לֹא־ <WH3808> have not יָ֥כְלוּ <WH3201> yet they have not prevailed לִֽי׃
עַל־ <WH5921> upon גַּ֭בִּי <WH1354> upon my back חָרְשׁ֣וּ <WH2790> The plowers חֹרְשִׁ֑ים <WH2790> plowed הֶ֝אֱרִ֗יכוּ <WH748> they made long [לְמַעֲנֹותָם כ] (לְמַעֲנִיתָֽם׃ <WH4618> furrow ק)
יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> The LORD צַדִּ֑יק <WH6662> [is] righteous קִ֝צֵּ֗ץ <WH7112> he hath cut asunder עֲב֣וֹת <WH5688> the cords רְשָׁעִֽים׃ <WH7563> of the wicked
יֵ֭בֹשׁוּ <WH954> Let them all be confounded וְיִסֹּ֣גוּ <WH5472> and turned אָח֑וֹר <WH268> back כֹּ֝֗ל <WH3605> may all שֹׂנְאֵ֥י <WH8130> that hate צִיּֽוֹן׃ <WH6726> Zion

יִ֭הְיוּ <WH1961> them be like כַּחֲצִ֣יר <WH2682> Let them be as the grass גַּגּ֑וֹת <WH1406> [upon] the housetops שֶׁקַּדְמַ֖ת <WH6927> afore שָׁלַ֣ף <WH8025> it groweth up יָבֵֽשׁ׃ <WH3001> which withereth
שֶׁלֹּ֤א <WH3808> does not מִלֵּ֖א <WH4390> filleth כַפּ֥וֹ <WH3709> not his hand קוֹצֵ֗ר <WH7114> Wherewith the mower וְחִצְנ֥וֹ <WH2683> his bosom מְעַמֵּֽר׃ <WH6014> nor he that bindeth sheaves

וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> Nor אָֽמְר֨וּ ׀ <WH559> say הָעֹבְרִ֗ים <WH5674> Neither do they which go by בִּרְכַּֽת־ <WH1293> The blessing יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH413> about בֵּרַ֥כְנוּ <WH1288> [be] upon you we bless אֶ֝תְכֶ֗ם <WH853> בְּשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> you in the name יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD
